# Canasta Master Club

> [cite_start]A high-performance, competitive online Canasta platform featuring authentic rules, ELO-based matchmaking, and dual-timer anti-AFK systems.

## Public Entry Points & Conversion Path
- [cite_start][Home Page](https://www.canastamaster.club/): The primary landing page featuring live world rankings and the path to account creation[cite: 1, 3].
- [cite_start][Rules & Scoring](https://www.canastamaster.club/how-to-play): A comprehensive technical guide to game mechanics, variations, and card point values[cite: 2].
- [Matchmaking](https://www.canastamaster.club/screen-online): Access to rated ELO play and casual private rooms.

## Core Game Mechanics
- [cite_start]**Rulesets**: Supports Standard (Draw 2 cards, 2 Canastas to out) and Easy (Draw 1 card, 1 Canasta to out) variations[cite: 2, 7, 8].
- [cite_start]**Player Formats**: Individual 2-player mode (15 cards dealt) and team-based 4-player mode (11 cards dealt)[cite: 5, 6].
- [cite_start]**Card Glossary**: Detailed point values for all cards, including Jokers (50), Aces/2s (20), and Natural Canastas (500)[cite: 2].

## Competitive & Fair Play Systems
- [cite_start]**Dual-Timer System**: Matches use a 12-minute total match bank and a strict 60-second turn limit to prevent stalling[cite: 4, 9, 10].
- [cite_start]**ELO Ranking**: Competitive rating system featuring margin-of-victory scaling to reward dominant performances[cite: 3].
- [cite_start]**Anti-Griefing**: Disconnecting or forfeiting results in a 1.5x rating loss multiplier to protect competitive integrity[cite: 10].
